title: No more game!

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Flex your sick Horse Plinko gif during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only flex your sick Horse Plinko gif twice, and after you flex your sick Horse Plinko gif, you may not do so for the next two days.
- When you flex your sick Horse Plinko gif, the host must, before anything else, post the attached gif. They then must immediately end the day phase, closing the channel but otherwise giving no notification in said channel. They may, however, notify the night phase outside of the day channel.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Flex your sick Horse Plinko gif twice.
Image URL:https://tenor.com/view/horse-plinko-gif-24830229

desc:
Post 421
*What? You think only Wolfi can pull this bullshit?*
